summary:
**Meeting Overview**: The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel B) will convene on March 20, 2024, with a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to address various zoning and adjustment requests from residents and stakeholders.

**Key Agenda Items**: The meeting will include a staff presentation, public hearing, and public testimony. Key items on the agenda involve reviewing and approving minutes from the previous meeting and discussing several uncontested and individual case applications for zoning adjustments.

**Important Details**: Significant proposals include requests for special exceptions and variances related to single-family use regulations, fence height and opacity regulations, and floor area ratio and building height regulations. Notable cases include applications for properties located at 4320 Blackheath Road, 9241 Midway Road, 718 S. Rosemont Avenue, and 5820 Palo Pinto Avenue.

**Action Items**: The Board is seeking approvals for the minutes from the February 21, 2024, meeting and decisions on the various zoning adjustment applications presented during the meeting. Public participation is encouraged, with registration required for those wishing to speak.
